language.item: With this module you can administer the guestbook.
Someone has written a new guestbook entry on the website %1$s. Please click on the link below to review the entry (maybe it is necessary to login before): %2$s
Someone has written a new guestbook entry on the website %1$s. Please click on the link below to review and activate the entry (maybe it is necessary to login before): %2$s
Please select whether you want to allow emoticons or not.
Please select whether you want to allow users to subscribe into the newsletter when creating a new guestbook entry.
Please select whether you want to be notified about new guestbook entries or not.
Please select whether users shoud be allowed to create guestbook entries in an overlay or not.
Yes, I would like to receive the newsletter of "%s".
To receive the newsletter, you must provide a valid e-mail address.
Create guestbook entries in an overlay
